title: The tech entrepreneur betting he can get younger
description: Millions of dollars are being poured into research to find ways of making lives longer and healthier.

title: Facebook $725m settlement fund opens to US claims
description: Anyone who had a Facebook account in the US between May 2007 and December 2022 can apply.

title: Elon Musk threatens to sue Microsoft over Twitter data
description: The multi-billionaire was responding to the tech giant's plan to drop Twitter from its advertising platform.

title: US imposes $300m penalty over hard disk drive exports to Huawei
description: It is the latest move by the US government to stop sales of sophisticated technology to China.
